mean_cn: n. 黑名单；  v. 把…列入黑名单
mean_en: a list of the names of people, companies, products or countries that an organization or a government considers unacceptable and that must be avoided
sentence: He was on restaurant's blacklist for eating too much at the buffet.
sentence_trans: 因为自助餐吃太多，他上了餐馆的黑名单。
